title: You will put Starmer in No 10, Sunak warns Reform voters
description: Credit: Matt Pover/GB News Rishi Sunak has told Reform UK supporters that they will put Sir Keir Starmer’s Labour Party into Number 10 unless they vote Conservative in a plea on live television. Answering questions from voters in County Durham on GB News ...

title: Rochdale by-election: Labour received 'new information' about Azhar Ali before withdrawing support
description: The Labour Party has withdrawn support for its candidate in the Rochdale by-election after receiving new information about comments he is alleged to have made.

title: Starmer’s public-sector fat cats will drag us down
description: Labour’s plan to protect top workers from pensions raid shows an obsession with managerialism

title: Inside Scottish Labour leader Anas Sarwar’s leadership style – inspired by legendary football manager
description: “I hope people see that in me, winning for a purpose.” But an SNP spokesperson highlighted comments where Mr Sarwar said Labour leader Keir Starmer must deliver a “popular” government for Scottish Labour to win in the 2026 Holyrood electio

title: Azhar Ali: Labour's former Rochdale by-election candidate criticised by Preston Jewish faith leader over Israel attack comments
description: A Jewish community leader in Preston says comments made by a senior Lancashire county councillor alleging Israel deliberately allowed the 7th October terrorist attack have given fuel to “demons” on social media spreading other unsubstantiated claims about the state.

title: Labour withdraws support for Azhar Ali after Israel claims
description: Labour has withdrawn its support for Pendle's Azhar Ali as the Rochdale by-election candidate following criticism of remarks he made about Israel

title: Starmer withdraws support for Rochdale by-election candidate after 'deeply offensive' anti-Israel rant
description: Labour finally acts after spending much of Monday trying to defend Azhar Ali - with party suspending him pending an investigation

title: On the streets of Rochdale Labour have a problem
description: The town has been caught up in controversy after Labour's former candidate who wants to be the next MP made 'deeply offensive' comments about Israel - but there are other things occupying voters' mind

title: Labour Withdraws Support For Rochdale By-Election Candidate Azhar Ali
description: Labour has withdrawn their support for Rochdale by-election candidate Azhar Ali, after widespread criticism of remarks he had made about Israel.

title: Rishi Sunak issues warning over Labour as Brits urged not to fall for Keir Starmer's 'con'
description: Rishi Sunak vowed to fix the social care system, slash NHS waiting lists and continue to ease the cost of living crisis if the Tories win the next general election.

title: Rochdale by-election: Labour withdraws support for candidate Azhar Ali after 'antisemitism' remarks
description: The Labour Party has withdrawn support for its candidate in the Rochdale by-election after receiving an official complaint over his antisemitic remarks.

title: Keir Starmer finally cuts ties with Labour by-election candidate after fresh row explodes

title: Keir Starmer faces General Election challenge from Palestine activists

title: Keir Starmer stands by ‘conspiracy theory’ candidate in Labour antisemitism row

title: Sir Keir Starmer slammed for 'tin-eared' response to anti-Israel rant by Labour Rochdale by-election candidate
description: Sir Keir Starmer came under growing pressure on Monday to cut adrift Labour’s Rochdale by-election candidate for claiming Israel deliberately allowed the October 7 massacre of more than 1,200 citizens by Hamas to happen.

title: SNP Westminster leader urges PM and Sir Keir Starmer to back Gaza ceasefire
description: SNP Westminster leader Stephen Flynn has written to the Prime Minister and Labour leader urging them to back an immediate ceasefire in Gaza amid mounting concern over a planned Israeli ground invasion of Rafah. Mr Flynn said that such action there would “amount to waging a war in the largest refugee camp in the world.”

title: Rod Stewart gives scathing verdict on the Tories and says Labour 'deserve a crack'

title: Starmer faces growing unrest over Rochdale candidate’s anti-Israel comments
